content: सगोत्र {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Being of the same family or kin, related. --त्रः {@--1@} A kinsman sprung from a common ancestor; तत्रमवतो युष्मत्सगोत्रस्य कण्वस्यापराद्धोम्मि <ls>Ś. 7.</ls> {@--2@} A kinsman of the same family, one connected by funeral oblations of food and water. {@--3@} A distant kinsman. --त्रं Family, race, lineage.
